features: Slim fit with stretch for ease of movement
Two drop-in front pockets and back-right zip pocket for stashing valuables
Lightweight fabrication allows compressibility for packing down to the size of the back pocket

Body: 2.6-oz 100% recycled polyester stretch ripstop with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish. Waistband: 3.7-oz 91% recycled polyester/9% spandex plain weave with a DWR finish. Pocket bags: 2.5-oz 100% polyester tricot mesh
